answers.answer: Have you started a new OTC or Rx?  I have had certain drugs cause weight loss.  And I had weight loss from malabsorption when I first figured out I had Celiac disease.  And diabetes initial symptom can be weight loss.  Also being hyperthyroid can cause weight loss.  Or maybe you gave up beer or something and forgot it had calories.

question: loss of weight, not sick and not pregnant whats the problem?
title: health
